page.title: 10THE FARMING DAY
page.content: {Jenny's Dad}gets up at 6.15a.m..His first job is to milk the cows and then his second job is to wash down the parlour.Then he goes and puts the cover on the silage pit and puts tyres on it.The fourth job is to feed the sheep.At 12.00p.m.he goes in for his dinner.At 2.15p.m.he goes back and feeds the cows and sheep.Then he milks the cows.He is always out side until 10.00p.m. {Debbie's Mum}gets up at 5.30a.m..Her first job is to milk the cows then she feeds the calves.She cooks the breakfast and does some odd jobs in the house until dinner time.Then she feeds the calves again.After she milks the cows. She gets tea and goes back outside to help move the cows.Then when she comes in at 9.30p.m.she has her supper and goes to bed.Debbie's Mum has a very busy life.
